pages.text:
About Us
Who is Parklife LLC?
Parkilfe LLC. is a DRS Realty-owned entity specializing in the ownership of manufactured home communities. Parklife offers a variety of products and services, including sales of manufactured homes, rental properties, available financing for homes owned by Parklife, and multiple investment opportunities. Parklife provides in-house property management services for each of our investments. Each property has on-site property management and maintenance personnel. Our properties show the time and hands-on attention given to each of our communities. Our occupancy levels exceed the market averages, and the property condition, safety, and appeal exceed our competitors. This results in greater value for the homes located in our communities. Most importantly, we are a community. Much like its parent Company, DRS Realty, Parklife prides itself in owning and operating friendly, tight-knit, family-oriented manufactured home communities.
